The concession will be granted to the Scheduled Caste Girls Students studying from I Standard to V Standard either in Government or private recognized educational institutions. 
 1. Annual income of the parent guardian shall not exceed ₹24000/-.

ctu_text: All the Scheduled Caste Girls Students of the Union Territory of Puducherry are eligible for the scholarship. \n 1. The concession envisaged under the scheme will be granted to Scheduled Caste Girls Students who are native of the Union Territory of Puducherry or are residing in the Union Territory of Puducherry for a continuous period of not less than five years. \n 1.

**Step 02**: After successfully get registration done, students will get their “Student Registration ID”. 
**Step 03:** Through “Student Registration ID” students will be able to login into the account using the icon “Fresh Application” at NSP Portal. 
**Step 04:** After successful login to the portal, the welcome page appeared.
